<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Correctly update FunctionPropertiesInfo post-inlining. A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// FunctionPropertiesUpdater keeps the state necessary for tracking the changes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// llvm::InlineFunction makes. The idea is that inlining will at most modify</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a few BBs of the Caller (maybe the entry BB and definitely the callsite BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and potentially affect exception handling BBs in the case of invoke</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesupdater"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesupdater/#a1ba00e4f051e690dfe2e14625ce165d3">FunctionPropertiesUpdater</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesupdater/#a1ba00e4f051e690dfe2e14625ce165d3">FunctionPropertiesUpdater</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesinfo">FunctionPropertiesInfo</a> &amp;FPI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesupdater/#a53810b3b6ca8d3846b024899661c5e4a">finish</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a83c7e5ca51099e4efa895791a02fb0ed">FAM</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
